trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bella Vista
There were no other sightings in Bella Vista on or around January 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsFor about 10 minutes I watched what looked like a star blink every 7 seconds. It looked very high up in the sky and roughly the same brightness as your average star. The light move very little and stayed in the same spot and eventually go dimmer and went away...
Summary: I watched a white light blink in the sky
